create(User) - Method in class javafxserverside.rest.UserREST
RESTful POST method for creating User objects from XML representation.
CreateException - Exception in javafxserverside.exception
This class represents any error during user object's creation in application storage.
CreateException() - Constructor for exception javafxserverside.exception.CreateException
Creates a new instance of CreateUserException without detail message.
CreateException(String) - Constructor for exception javafxserverside.exception.CreateException
Constructs an instance of CreateUserException with the specified detail message.
createUser(User) - Method in class javafxserverside.ejb.UserManagerEJB
